prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Keeping up with the constant flow of technological advancements and identifying key technologies amidst daily noise can be challenging for businesses and individuals alike.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Technological advancements, key technologies, businesses, individuals, information flow, challenges
